fields.title: Category/Subcategory Explanations
fields.content:
Category / SubcategoryExplanation
Service ProvidersIssues with finding a service provider, with the execution of the service provider contract, or with other related issues
-- Not findingNot able to find appropriate service providers
-- Not startedService provider did not start project as agreed
-- DelaysService provider was delayed in project execution
-- Abandoned ProjectService provider abandoned project
-- Substandard ServiceService provider delivered substandard service
-- OtherOther issues with service providers
StakeholdersIssues related to the different stakeholders: State PIU officials, FUG and FCA members, Facilitators, or others
-- State officialsIssue with State PIU officials
-- FUGIssue with FUG members
-- FCAIssue with FCA members
-- FacilitatorsIssue with Facilitators
-- OtherIssue with other stakeholders
Land IssuesIssues with finding land or finding suitable land, with land ownership, or other related issues
-- Not findingNot able to find land for project
-- Not suitableNot able to find land that is suitable for project
-- OwnershipIssue with land ownership
-- OtherOther issues related to land
Lack of InformationLack of information on markets, agricultural inputs, credit options, or other issues
-- MarketLack of information on markets: access, pricing, or other issues
-- InputLack of information on agricultural inputs: what to use or how to use them
-- Access to creditLack of information on obtaining access to credit
-- OtherOther issues relating to lack of available information
LDP ApprovalDelays with LDP approval or other LDP-related issues
-- DelaysDelays with LDP approval
-- OtherOther issues related to the LDP
Financial IssuesChallenges in opening bank account, delays in receiving matching grant, or other financial issues
-- Bank Account OpeningIssues with opening a bank account
-- Delayed FundingDelays in receiving matching grant
-- OtherOther issues related to finances
Waiting TimeAmount of time the reporting patient waited in the facility before receiving care
Staff FriendlinessPerceived friendliness of the facility staff from the perspective of the reporting patient
Drug AvailabilityAvailability of the drug(s) needed by and/or prescribed to the reporting patient at the facility
Prices DisplayedPublic display of the prices of drugs and services rendered to the reporting patient at the facility
Cleanliness & HygienePerceived cleanliness of the facility and its equipment from the perspective of the reporting patient
